tools.name: ReactJS Vite Boilerplate
tools.short_desc: Vite template with preconfigured Reactjs, Typescript and Tailwind CSS. Many useful hooks and libraries are pre-included.

tools.name: useDocTheme React Hook
tools.short_desc: React hook for switching theme between light, dark and system. Compatible with Tailwind CSS. Available on NPM.

tools.name: Desktop Wallpapers
tools.short_desc: A web-app to browse desktop wallpapers from various subreddits.

tools.name: Online Markdown Renderer
tools.short_desc: A simple online markdown renderer with live preview.
